FindingName: Ensure SharePoint external sharing is managed through domain whitelist/blacklists
Description: Control sharing of documents to external domains by either blocking domains or only allowing sharing with specific named domains.
Remediation: Depending on the organization's use case, external user resharing may be disabled. This is most easily accomplished with the Set-SPOTenant PowerShell commandlet from the SharePoint Online administration module, as follows: Set-SPOTenant -PreventExternalUsersFromResharing $true.
